name: The Vortex Deception
description:
This is my submission for the Holistic3D Lockdown Game Jam. The theme of the Jam was conspiracy theory. This game is a sequel to my first game jam project, Vortex Evac.

In The Vortex Deception, you play as the brother of the protagonist of Vortex Evac. You must save your brother from the the evil Hegemony. Rumors are that the Hegemony has been keeping your brother in cryogenic stasis so that they can create an army of super soldier clones armed with alien technology! Can you save your brother from the Mad Hegemony scientists?
